page.title: 17Matters of Concern
page.content: There is concern about changes and development of buildings in Main Street, Cockermouth particularly. Old-established 'traditional' businesses are being replaced by Building Societies, Banks and Travel Agencies. The new County Fire Service Headquarters on the old Railway Station site has taken valuable car-parking space. A footpath along the line of the disused railway has been blocked by the filling-in of a cutting below a bridge at Fern Bank, causing strong public protest. Many people are concerned about the number of dogs running loose in the town and housing estates with the consequent danger to children particularly. Graffiti and litter on public and private property is a continuing source of public concern.
